name: Sirens (Whare Mātoro (Otago Games Space))
description:
Navigate your ship through the treacherous waters of ancient, mythological Greece. Don't get drawn in by the sirens' call. It'll be your swan song!

This game was created by 3rd year Bachelor of Information Technology and Bachelor of Communication Design students in 2022.

By Stephen Parker (BIT), Greg Tweed (BDes), Amber Little (BIT), Blair Robertson (BDes), Joshua Newton-Kerr (BDes), Isobella Johnson (BIT) and Daniel Real (BIT).

Supported by Otago Polytechnic's game stream staff.

Adon Moskal, Grayson Orr, Paul Fox, Niklas Bergstrom, Morgan Oliver and Edwin McRae.
